title: Flow Food
typeOfFood: Vegan, Organic, Buffet, Mediterranean, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, European, Polish
description: Gluten free restaurant. Offers a daily lunch with soup. Serves a different happy bowl daily. Menu also includes scrambled tofu, millet with fruit, falafel, hummus (and other dips served with vegetables), salads, desserts, and house-made items such as gluten-free bread, mustard, yogurt. Has Wi-Fi.
